[03:19.91]Fear the light
[03:21.22]Fear the breath
[03:22.52]Fear the others for eternity
[03:25.28]But I hear them now inhale the clarity
[03:27.76]Hear the venom the venom in

[03:32.55]Bless this immunity
[03:38.61]Bless this immunity
[03:43.78]Bless this immunity
